Summary._: Northbound [6] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at 125 St.

Description._: Northbound [6] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at 125 St.

LongDescription:
Northbound [6] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at 125 St.

Our crews are on the scene working to correct the signal problem and we hope to resume regular service soon.

Summary._: Southbound [D] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at 9 Av.

Description._: Southbound [D] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at 9 Av.

LongDescription:
Southbound [D] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at 9 Av.

Our crews are on the scene making repairs and we hope to resume regular service as soon as possible.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  [7] Hudson Yards-bound trains skip 69, 52, 46, 40 and 33 Sts

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  [7] Hudson Yards-bound trains skip 69, 52, 46, 40 and 33 Sts

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT
[7] Hudson Yards-bound trains skip 69, 52, 46, 40 and 33 Sts

Apr 30 - May 4, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3 PM (except May 3)

For service to these stations, take the [7] to 61 St-Woodside or Queensboro Plaza
and transfer to a Flushing-bound [7].

For service from these stations, take the [7] to 61 St-Woodside or 74 St and transfer
to a Hudson Yards-bound [7].

Summary._: EQUIPMENT TESTING  [B] Brighton Beach-bound trains run local from Prospect Park to Kings Hwy

Description._: EQUIPMENT TESTING  [B] Brighton Beach-bound trains run local from Prospect Park to Kings Hwy

LongDescription:
EQUIPMENT TESTING
[B] Brighton Beach-bound trains run local from Prospect Park to Kings Hwy

10 AM to 3:30 PM, Mon to Thu, until May 24

• Please allow additional travel time.

Summary._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

Description._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

LongDescription:
Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection
[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead
[A] No rush hour service to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

All times, until Friday May 18, 2018

[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, approximately every 20 minutes, between
Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Broad Channel, take the [A], transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.

Alternate travel note for Broad Channel:
Q52-SBS, Q53-SBS, QM16 and QM17 service is also available at Cross Bay Blvd and Noel Rd.

Click here for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Broad St-bound [J] and Forest Hills-bound [M] trains skip Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St

Apr 30 until May 11, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM

For service to these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St* and transfer to a
Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Brooklyn-bound [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a
Broad St-bound [J] or Forest Hills-bound [M].

*Transfer at Marcy Av with Unlimited Ride MetroCard.

Alternate travel note:
Take the B46 bus via transfer at Myrtle Av or Marcy Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Summary._: SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE  [SIR] Trains board at the Tottenville-bound platform from Jefferson Av to Old Town Stations

Description._: SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE  [SIR] Trains board at the Tottenville-bound platform from Jefferson Av to Old Town Stations

LongDescription:
SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE
[SIR] Trains board at the Tottenville-bound platform from Jefferson Av to Old Town Stations

Apr 30 - May 4, Mon to Fri, 9 AM to 3 PM

• Boarding change includes Jefferson Av, Dongan Hills, and Old Town Stations.
